scripts.build: browserify -s xcxEngineIO -d ./lib/engine.io-client/index.js > ./dist/engine.io.xcx.js && browserify -s xcxSocketIO -d ./lib/socket.io-client/lib/index.js > ./dist/socket.io.xcx.js && uglifyjs ./dist/engine.io.xcx.js -o ./dist/engine.io.xcx.min.js && uglifyjs ./dist/socket.io.xcx.js -o ./dist/socket.io.xcx.min.js && uglifyjs ./dist/socket.io.xcx.js -o ./examples/app/socket.io.xcx.min.js
